title: Cane Creek Flip Your Fork Promo: Trade Your Gravel Fork for Invert
content:
Cane Creek just announced a new campaign that seeks to make it easier than ever to get on their Invert gravel fork. Flip Your Fork is a trade-in program in which Cane Creek is offering to buy the existing fork off of a rider’s gravel bike if they want to upgrade to an Invert…

This offer will be limited to the US and Canada only, for the first 250 riders who wish to participate.

Flip Your Fork Procedure (In-Store or Online, USA & Canada Only)

Step 1: Rider will begin by purchasing an Invert.

At this time, the rider will complete a simple online trade-in form which will trigger one of Cane Creek’s customer support representatives to create a pre-paid return shipping label for the original fork. This also opens a line of direct communication for any other technical support or questions the rider may have.

Step 2: Once the Invert is delivered, the rider will remove their old fork from the bike and pack it for return shipping in the Invert box.

Step 3: Using the Invert box and prepaid label, the rider will drop their old fork off at any UPS location to be sent to Cane Creek for recycling, artistic repurposing, or community co-op donation.

Step 4: Once the original fork has been received and processed, riders will receive a credit of $250 on the card used to make the Invert purchase.

Riders may also receive the $250 Flip Your Fork credit by trading in their fork through their local bike shop. Cane Creek’s dealer support team will be working closely with shops to support this program, making sure shops are able to participate as well.

How will riders know if their bike is compatible with Invert?

Cane Creek has created a simple infographic above to help.

Invert CS & SL are currently available for sale, with the Flip Your Fork program beginning Monday, March 17, and available to the first 250 riders to take advantage of the program.

Head to Canecreek.com or your local Cane Creek dealer to upgrade your gravel riding experience!
